verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: was] released from the hospital " in high spirits " Saturday after undergoing a kidney procedure earlier in the week .

[ARG1: Melania Trump] was [V: released] [ARG2: from the hospital] [ARGM-MNR: "] [ARGM-MNR: in high spirits "] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] [ARGM-TMP: after undergoing a kidney procedure earlier in the week] .
